title: Creating a Ranked 5 for S6
body:
So im trying to join a team but no team i can find really wants to play much and/or they are too tryhard and wanting to join OPL and stuff. Anyways, im going to make a team which i want friendly people who DONT think they are the best players in the world and DO want to improve. I'm Currently Silver 3 and am looking for anyone B3 or higher who wants to make a team WITH me. I don't want to be THE leader, and dont want to be THE captain. Also looking for people who want to improve as individuals as well as in coordination with team. Also would be nice if u didn't mind voice chatting (don't want it to be awkward if u don't want to but its pref)

Please leave the following below:
IGN:
Role:

Add me: XPitchPleaseX

Also would be nice if you are on frequently

replies.body:
Hey, if you need a support, I would love to join as well. Love that role!
IGN: Slowdownn

IGN: warlordsjustkill
Role: I can play all but pref not to be adc

happy to voice chat
i am on multiple times a week

IGN: Thatsbs
Role: ADC>sup>jung>top 

In that order

dont like voice chat though. I'm a senior citizen still with good reflexes. (So my mates tell me)

Cheers

IGN: An unstable atom
Role: I tend to prefer bot lane roles, but can play anywhere.

 Some roles/champs I haven't had much time to try out with the preseason changes.
Also I'm on most days ( even if I'm playing something else I still idle with league logged in).

Hi my name is Everest but in game it is Asssauce and i play Jungle as Vi but i also play adc time to time but i will play top is needed. 
I would love to play some ranked games as I want to get beter at this game like most people. 
A team is such a great idea so we don't have to deal with AFK's and troll.
Love to play so add me PLZ
:)
